content:
I'd be happy to help! However, I'm a large language model, I don't have real-time access to current weather conditions or forecasts. But I can suggest some ways for you to get the latest weather forecast for your weekend trip:

1. Check online weather websites: You can check websites like AccuWeather, Weather.com, or the National Weather Service (NWS) website for the latest forecast. Simply enter the location of the nature reserve or your zip code to get the forecast.
2. Use a weather app: Download a weather app on your smartphone, such as Dark Sky or Weather Underground, which can provide you with real-time weather forecasts and updates.
3. Tune into local news: Watch local news or listen to local radio stations for weather updates and forecasts.
4. Contact the nature reserve: Reach out to the nature reserve directly and ask about the weather forecast for the weekend. They may be able to provide you with information on trail conditions, weather forecasts, and any other important updates.

Remember to check the forecast regularly before your trip to ensure you're prepared for any weather conditions. Enjoy your trip to the nature reserve!
